title: Inquire About a Refund Status
description: A customer cancelled their policy last week and is calling to see when they will receive their prorated refund.

tasks.description: Identify the former customer and their cancelled policy.
Check the payment system for the status of the refund check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the refund check was processed and mailed yesterday.

tasks.description: Inform the customer that the check has been mailed and provide the check number and amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear status update to the customer.
